About

Product-focused engineering for scalable Shopify commerce systems. My work sits at the intersection of engineering, product thinking, and performance, building scalable, maintainable Shopify solutions for brands operating at scale.

I focus on architecture, long-term extensibility, and implementation decisions that support growth rather than short-term fixes. I've worked across agency and product environments, contributing to complex Shopify builds, custom integrations, and performance-led storefront development through frontend development and technical implementation.

Currently operating within a Shopify Platinum Partner environment, working on high-impact e-commerce projects where reliability, performance, and quality matter. I value thoughtful engineering, clear ownership, and building things that last.

Technical Expertise

Frontend development experience across modern web technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, SCSS/SASS, JavaScript ES6, React.js, and Liquid templating.

Building scalable architecture and performance-led implementations for commerce platforms, specialising in Shopify web development.

Working within mature delivery processes, contributing to architectural decisions, and maintaining high standards across code quality, performance, and maintainability.
